title: The Phoenix on the Sword
description: Conan has finished invading, replaced the former ruler, and dislikes his administrative role, opposed by rumors and a supernatural evil black beast. Conan himself needs support from the spirit world.Robert Ervin Howard (1906-1936) was most known for creating Conan. From an early age, the author suffered severe depression, from 18 years old, he thought suicide would be a release.
author: Robert E. Howard
